Package com.doa.engine.graphics

Class DoaGraphicsContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doa.engine.graphics.DoaGraphicsContext
  • public final class DoaGraphicsContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for wrapping the Graphics2D class Sun Microsystems provides. All and every method this class provides behaves exactly the same as documented in Graphics, Graphics2D and DoaSprites. Refer to these 3 class documentations for this class' behaviour.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.1
    Version:
    2.3.1
    Author:
    Doga Oruc
    See Also:
    Graphics, Graphics2D, DoaSprite, DoaSprites, DoaAnimation, DoaAnimations
